Adim Williams bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Naijiria nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Abuja Connection trilogy nke ihe nkiri.
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ nke ukwuu na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nollywood kemgbe afọ 2002, na-eduzi  dị ka foto 28 na ngwụcha afọ 2006.
Ihe nkiri ya Joshua bụ ihe nkiri Nollywood mbụ a na-ewebata n'ahịa DVD America, nke e wepụtara n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2005
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị ama ama na-eme ihe nkiri na fim "The Interview".
Adim Williams bụ onye nduzi na onye edemede, nke a maara maka Mr
Ibu in London (2004), Crying Angel (2005), na Valentino (2002).
Otu onye nche na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ala nke a na-akwa emo mgbe niile zoro n'ime akpa ibu ma hụ onwe ya na ndị na-enweghị ebe obibi n'okporo ámá London ruo mgbe ihe ijuanya na enyi ochie bịara nyere ya aka
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị ọrụ Charles Okocha, Maazị Ibu, Rita Johnson, John Okafor, Nkiru Ughanze, Remy Ohanjiyan, Ishola Oshun na ndị ọzọ.
